meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a man, especially in a robust or macho way.
meanings.sent1: The blokey man had a strong and tough appearance.
meanings.sent2: He always wore blokey clothes like plaid shirts and work boots.
meanings.sent3: The blokey guy tried to open a jar with his bare hands, thinking he was super strong.
meanings.sent4: His blokey attitude was like a shield, protecting him from showing any vulnerability.
meanings.sent5: The image of a blokey man with a beard and a flannel shirt is hard to forget.

meanings.definition: A man who is typically seen as masculine, down-to-earth, and sociable.
meanings.sent1: The blokey at the party was chatting with everyone and telling jokes.
meanings.sent2: He was a true blokey, always ready to lend a hand and share a laugh.
meanings.sent3: The blokey fellow organized a barbecue for his friends in the park.
meanings.sent4: Among his friends, he was the blokey anchor, keeping everyone grounded.
meanings.sent5: In the neighborhood, he was known as the friendly blokey who helped fix things.
